name: Sigma
description: $SIGMA is not just another meme coin; it's a cultural phenomenon on the Solana blockchain. With over 100B views on TikTok, and roots tracing back to 4chan, Sigma memes are foundational to internet history. What began as a simple meme on social media has evolved into one of the most ambitious crypto movements. Embodying the ethos of being Sigma - self-reliant, independent, and nonconformist. The community behind $SIGMA is passionate, resilient, and unapologetically assertive, creating a vibe that's all about challenging the status quo and striving for greatness on one's own terms.
